miml.evaluation

Class EvaluatorCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • miml.evaluation.EvaluatorCV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfiguration, IEvaluator<mulan.evaluation.MultipleEvaluation>

    public class EvaluatorCV
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfiguration, IEvaluator<mulan.evaluation.MultipleEvaluation>
    Class that allow evaluate an algorithm applying a cross-validation method.
    Version:
    20180630
    Author:
    Alvaro A. Belmonte, Eva Gibaja, Amelia Zafra
